constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 115 (Thursday, July 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BOEBERT:
H.R. 4302.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2 (the Property Clause).
Under this clause, Congress has the power to dispose of and
make all needful rules and regulations respecting the
territory or other property belonging to the United States.
[Page H3601]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

title: Active Forest Management, Wildfire Prevention and Community Protection Act
